thread.section_title: Sacramento Police: Protester With Device Shuts Down Tower Bridge, Capitol Mall – CBS Sacramento
thread.title: Sacramento Police: Protester With Device Shuts Down Tower Bridge, Capitol Mall
thread.title_full: Sacramento Police: Protester With Device Shuts Down Tower Bridge, Capitol Mall

author: Kyle Buis
title: Sacramento Police: Protester With Device Shuts Down Tower Bridge, Capitol Mall
text:
SACRAMENTO (CBS13) — A woman claiming to have a device has shut down traffic around the Tower Bridge on Tuesday.
Sacramento Police say a protester near the bridge caused the closure of the bridge and Capitol Mall.
Police are working to contact the woman and bring a resolution to the issue.
